# SegmentDefinitions.HasIdentifier method

Indicates whether or not the marker is mapped to a segment class with an identifier.

```csharp
public bool HasIdentifier(Marker marker)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| marker | The segment marker. |

## Return Value

Returns `true` if the marker is mapped to a segment class with an identifier, `false` otherwise.
